name: READY
description: Contains initial state information sent after identifying. This is the first event received after a successful IDENTIFY.

guilds.description: Guilds the user is in (includes full guild data for non-bots, unavailable placeholders for bots)

id.description: User ID of the related user

since.description: ISO8601 timestamp of when the relationship was established

nickname.description: Custom nickname for the related user

items.description: Relationship with user field stripped (user data in users array)

relationships.description: User relationships (friends, blocked, pending) with user objects stripped

users.description: Users referenced by relationships, channels, and guild members (deduped)

presences.description: Presences of friends and group DM recipients

session_id.description: Session identifier ('all' for aggregated, or specific ID)

mobile.description: Whether the session is from a mobile device

sessions.description: Active gateway sessions for the current user

read_states.description: Channel read state (last read message IDs)

notes.description: User notes keyed by user ID

country_code.description: Two-letter country code based on IP geolocation

pinned_dms.description: Array of pinned DM channel IDs

auth_session_id_hash.description: Hash of the authentication session ID
